thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hangzhou Electronic Soul Network Technology sees FY 2017 net profit down 34 pct to 40 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hangzhou Electronic Soul Network Technology sees FY 2017 net profit down 34 pct to 40 pct

organizations.name: hangzhou electronic soul network technology co ltd

text:
Jan 25(Reuters) - Hangzhou Electronic Soul Network Technology Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 34 percent to 40 percent
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 256.1 million yuan
* Says increased expenses of R&D and marketing promotion and decreased government subsidies are the main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/7iAbAm
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
